tutorial.title: Medical Chat Tutorial
tutorial.description: Learn how to use our mobile medical consultation platform effectively

completionCertificate.template: Congratulations! You've completed the Medical Chat Tutorial.

slides.title: Welcome to MedChat
slides.subtitle: Getting Started with Your Medical Consultation
slides.text: Start by opening the MedChat app and tapping 'Start New Conversation' to begin your consultation.
bulletPoints: Download and open the MedChat mobile app
Create an account or log in
Tap 'Start New Conversation' button
Choose your preferred language if prompted
slides.tip: üí° Tip: Make sure you have a stable internet connection before starting your consultation.

slides.title: Describe Your Symptoms
slides.subtitle: Providing Clear and Detailed Information
slides.text: Type your main concern clearly and specifically. The more details you provide, the better assistance you'll receive.
bulletPoints: Describe your primary symptom or concern
Include when symptoms started (hours, days, weeks ago)
Rate severity on a scale of 1-10
Mention any related symptoms
List any medications you're currently taking
slides.tip: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Be honest and thorough - this helps healthcare providers give you the best guidance.
slides.warning: üö® For emergency situations (chest pain, difficulty breathing, severe injury), call emergency services immediately.

media.caption: Symptom description interface

interactive.question: What information should you include when describing symptoms?
options: When they started and severity level
All symptoms, timing, severity, and current medications
interactive.explanation: Comprehensive information helps healthcare providers make better assessments.

hotspots.tooltip: Tap here to start typing your symptoms

slides.title: Get Your Assessment
slides.subtitle: Understanding Your Triage Results
slides.text: Review the AI-powered triage recommendation and connect with the appropriate healthcare provider based on your needs.
bulletPoints: Read the triage assessment carefully
Understand the urgency level (Low, Medium, High, Emergency)
Review recommended next steps
Choose to connect with available healthcare providers
Save your consultation summary for future reference
slides.tip: üìã Tip: Keep a record of your consultation for follow-up appointments or insurance purposes.

media.caption: Your personalized assessment results

slides.title: Connect with Providers
slides.subtitle: Getting Professional Medical Guidance
slides.text: Based on your assessment, you can now connect with qualified healthcare professionals for personalized care.
bulletPoints: View available healthcare providers
Check provider specialties and availability
Schedule an appointment or start immediate chat
Share your assessment results with the provider
Ask questions and get professional medical advice

slides.title: Tutorial Complete!
slides.subtitle: You're Ready to Use MedChat
slides.text: Congratulations! You now know how to use MedChat effectively for your healthcare needs. Remember to always seek emergency care for urgent situations.
bulletPoints: You can start a new consultation anytime
Your consultation history is saved in your account
Enable notifications to hear back from providers
Rate your experience to help us improve
Contact support if you need additional help
